summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Pacific Avenue (West Seattle) between the south line of Price Street to the north line of South Street in the City of Seattle, cleaing grubbing, seduo alking under Ordinance No. 182, creating Local Improvement District No. W-9 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
